backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing complaints with storage, authorization, lifecycle timestamps, and role-gated submission and retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing feature evidence, linked files, components, and test coverage for password flow changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of frontend files including authentication, complaints, UI components, and dashboards.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH civic color palette and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: App entry HTML mounting the root element and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/README.md: Frontend setup instructions covering prerequisites and steps to run the Civic Lens app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app configuring routes and showing password verification modal only when a user has a stored password and isn't yet verified.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout control that clears session and password verification state on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting users with existing passwords to verify them before continuing.
Type definitions for the password verification modal props.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInOptio: Google/Apple sign‑in buttons using Internet Identity login handling retries and loading states.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Befor: Displays before and after complaint photos with status‑based badges and fallback when no after photo exists.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Compl: Shows detailed complaint metadata including priority, SLA, timestamps, location, and reporter info.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Escal: Renders a destructive badge showing how long ago a complaint was escalated.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Photo: Handles image upload with validation, preview rendering, and removal for complaint photo evidence.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Prior: Displays a badge indicating complaint priority level with icons based on urgency.
frontend/src/components/complaints/SlaBa: Shows remaining time or overdue status for a complaint's SLA deadline.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Resolut: Form for submitting resolution feedback including confirmation, rating, comments, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout with navigation links, authentication checks, admin routes, and mobile menu via sheet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, reinitializing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, identity loading, and authentication status management.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordVerificati: Hook managing password verification state via sessionStorage with cross-tab sync.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user roles, complaints, and complaint mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with custom light/dark civic-themed design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that mounts React, sets up React Query, and provides Internet Identity context.
frontend/src/pages/citizen/MyReportsPage: Citizen dashboard showing open complaints with badges, details, and links to view each report.
frontend/src/pages/citizen/SubmitComplai: Form page for authenticated citizens to submit new complaints with category, description, location, and photo upload.
frontend/src/pages/complaints/ComplaintD: Displays detailed complaint info and allows admins to update status, upload after-photos, and manage resolution.
frontend/src/pages/DocsPage.tsx: Documentation page detailing prerequisites and setup steps for running Civic Lens.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with hero section, sign-in options, and explanation of the reporting process.
frontend/src/pages/official/HigherOffici: Dashboard for higher officials to review and access escalated complaints beyond the response window.
frontend/src/pages/official/OfficialDash: Admin dashboard showing open and in‑progress complaints with filtering tabs and quick access to manage each case.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and layout settings.
project_state.json: Describes the Civic Lens project state, including workflow requirements like deadlines, escalation, deduplication, authentication limits, and feature list with current implementation status.
